text: Barbara Pec-Ślesicka (24 August 1936 - 6 July 2020) was a Polish movie producer and production manager. She was born in Łódź, Poland. Pec-Ślesicka was known for producing Rok pierwszy, Without Anesthesia and Danton. She was the mother of Macieja Ślesickiego. Pec-Ślesicka died on 6 July 2020, aged 83.Zmarła Barbara Pec-Ślesicka ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish movie producers Category:Polish businesspeople
